amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to increase from $44,000 to $100,000 for couples the threshold at which Social Security benefits are subject to taxation. The annual income level for single Social Security beneficiaries would have gone from $34,000 to $80,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in House Report 106-795 which inserts a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Pomeroy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pomeroy amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 169 - 256 (Roll no. 449).
